name: Stadiums Breakfast Plate
desc: Eggs, hash browns and toast. Served with your choice of 2 slices of bacon or 2 sausages.

name: Biscuit & Gravy
desc: Sunrise Bagel Biscuit covered in homemade sausage gravy served with 2 eggs.

name: Breakfast Burrito
desc: Homestyle Potatoes, Scrambled eggs and Cheddar Cheese. Plus your choice of any 3: (Ham, Bacon, Sausage, Onion, Green Pepper, Mushroom or Tomato)

name: French Toast
desc: 2 slices served with eggs and your choice of Sausage or Bacon.

name: Pancakes
desc: 2 pancakes, served with eggs and your choice of Sausage or Bacon.

name: Chicken Fried Steak
desc: Served with homemade sausage gravy, 2 eggs, hash browns and toast.

name: Breakfast Sandwich
desc: Fried egg, bacon, ham, american cheese and mayo. Served on sour dough bread.
